title: 44. Where Have All the Hitchhikers Gone?
description: Did we needlessly scare ourselves into ditching a good thing? And, with millions of cars driving around with no passengers, should we be rooting for a renaissance?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: Did we needlessly scare ourselves into ditching a good thing? And, with millions of cars driving around with no passengers, should we be rooting for a renaissance?
